title: Paypal Popup Hangs During Checkout on Multiple Pages
content: I've noticed for a few months now that Paypal is completely broken on Firefox. I've attempted clearing cookies and the cache, troubleshooting mode, turning enhanced tracking protection off, dropping the privacy protection down to "standard," restarting the browser, removing blocker add-ons, and anything else I could think of. Safari, I found, works perfectly.
creator: degolinsky

title: Esquema de cores quebrado no site da Crunchyroll
content:
Não o porque, mas a Crunchyroll é o único site que eu uso que está com o esquema de cores quebrado no Firefox, não dá pra ler nada no site. Não achei alguém que tenha tido esse tipo de problema e não consegui arrumar mexendo nas configurações.

Imagens de como está no Firefox e no Chrome.
creator: guidolim_gu

title: Is this a genuine message from Yahoo?   I have copied it below
content:
Dear gnuoy1234@yahoo.com.au,

Our current record indicates that your account was detected of spam activities and has been blacklisted as a result of that.

Failure to confirm and update your account within 24 hours will lead to permanent suspension of your account.

Review and confirm your account below.


Review/Confirm Your gnuoy1234@yahoo.com.au



References

2023 ⓒ yahoo.com.au Email support.
creator: gnuoy1234

title: Reorder extensions
content:
I want to re-order the add-ons / extensions in the toolbar shared with the search bar. Customize toolbar only has functions/icons related to the operation of Firefox. I want to customize the extensions toolbar, but how?

In the add-ons page, I can remove, disable, or enable extensions, but I cannot change the order of them.

As an example, there is an add-on for my Firefox account that is leftmost in the bar of extension icons. I would like to move it all the way to the right. Again, how would I do that?

Thanks for your help.
creator: alizabgold

title: error Reference #18.c6fcc317.1683072150.3b374103
